data.oai_dc:dc: Sampling event, spacial coverage, seagrass, fish diversity, Caribbean

This dataset represents the results of the 1st Venezuelan Workshop on Methods for Studying Seagrass Ecosystems, held at INVEMAR, Sta. Marta, Colombia, 13-17 May 2019. Thalassia testudinum density, cover and biomass were estimated using standard protocols and fish predation rate by "squidpops" protocol by MarineGEO.|40 occurrences
